name: Raw Stringy Meat
description: Raw Stringy Meat is a prime cut of raw meat that drops from various Fauna . Eating Raw Stringy Meat will replenish Health , but there is a possibility of negative Status Effects when doing so. It is better to Cook first before eating.
crafted_at: the Butchery Bench using Raw Meat

base_recipe.crafted_at: the Butchery Bench using Raw Meat
